title: Diamond Dazzle Bangle Set - Traditional Kadas
materials: G-H color). Features a 'Hyderabadi Polish' for lasting brilliance.
features: Slim and elegant design. The design features a line of Diamonds between a gold bar, adding a touch of modernity to the traditional Kada. The diamonds are set in a prong setting for maximum sparkle. The simple yet refined design makes it a versatile piece.
occasions: and as a thoughtful gift for anniversaries or birthdays. Also suitable for modern evening wear.
description: Exquisitely crafted using high-quality materials, this bangle set blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The 22K gold ensures lasting value and the Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich, lustrous finish. The simple and comfortable design makes it a perfect blend of tradition and modern.
